course_description: This course is a beginning-level technique class and is designed to introduce students to ballet terminology, technique, and performance. This course will concentrate on body alignment, technical development, performance quality, and proper execution of ballet exercises and combinations.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3836, Section #: 1, Type: PE, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: A. Abarca, Status: Closed
